title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Evoke Pharma Inc

content.text: Evoke Pharma Inc completes its initial public offering (IPO).
Evoke Pharma Inc's stock undergoes a 1-for-10 reverse stock split, reducing the number of outstanding shares and increasing the share price.
Evoke Pharma Inc announces a registered direct offering of its common stock.
Evoke Pharma Inc announces a reverse stock split of its common stock at a ratio of 1-for-5.
Evoke Pharma Inc announces a reverse stock split of its common stock at a ratio of 1-for-10.
Evoke Pharma Inc's proposed merger with privately-held Cosmo Pharmaceuticals NV is terminated.
Evoke Pharma Inc announces a reverse stock split of its common stock at a ratio of 1-for-10.
Evoke Pharma Inc receives a Complete Response Letter (CRL) from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for its Gimoti NDA.

news.headline: Evoke Pharma, Inc. Announces Reverse Stock Split
news.summary: SOLANA BEACH, Calif., July 30, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Evoke Pharma, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVOK), a specialty pharmaceutical company focused primarily on treatments for gastrointestinal (GI) diseases with an emphasis on GIMOTIÂ® (metoclopramide) nasal spray, today announced that its board of directors (Board) has approved a 1-for-12 reverse stock split of the company's common stock. The reverse stock split will become effective at 12:01 a.m. Eastern time on August 1, 2024. The company's common stock is
